sentences.english: I welcome the hard work that has been done by the Congress on these and other issues.
sentences.chinese: 我对国会在上述问题及其他问题上勤勉于事表示欢迎。

sentences.english: He is both wise and diligent,so he makes good in everything.
sentences.chinese: 他既聪明又勤勉，所以每件事都做得很好。

sentences.english: Honesty and diligence should be your eternal mates.
sentences.chinese: 诚实与勤勉应该成为你永久的伴侣。

sentences.english: Being industrious students, they would write all kinds of notes down.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩都是勤勉的学生，记录下了各种笔记。
我们是勤勉的，有创造力的人类。
勤勉奋进口号到处都是。

sentences.english: He was a man of much ability, and was both active and industrious;
sentences.chinese: 金恩很有能力，兼具活跃和勤勉的品质。

sentences.english: Diligence is the Mother of Good Luck.
Either the government is being extremely diligent in crossing every 't' and dotting every 'i'.
sentences.chinese: 要么是政府工作极度勤勉，不放过任何蛛丝马迹。

sentences.english: No one can deny that, as an actor, Andy Liu is diligent.
sentences.chinese: 谁都不能否认，作为一名演员，刘德华是勤勉的。

sentences.english: Success depends upon one's perseverance and diligence.
sentences.chinese: 成功端赖一个人的坚忍与勤勉。

sentences.english: I am hardworking and am non-materialistic.
sentences.chinese: 我是勤勉和上午非唯物论。

sentences.english: As far as I know, she works industriously and responsibly.
sentences.chinese: 就我所知，她工作勤勉认真负责。

sentences.english: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
sentences.chinese: 学习并非偶得的，必得是用热诚寻找和勤勉出席。

sentences.english: Five is for the family so dear.

definition: to be strict with oneself (idiom)/to demand a lot of oneself
(to play) one's part/one's role/one's duty/(to stay within) one's bounds/dutiful/keeping to one's role
